Logger
internal sealed
Logger

Logging control. The log4net subsystem is configured to pass log message through to this class' static Log() method. Log messages are held in a circular buffer and are displayed in a referenced GUI ListBox.

LogDelegate
delegate void LogDelegate(
string message
)
